setting.primary_location: Global - focusing on Atacama Desert Observatory (Chile), Washington D.C., Geneva (UN Headquarters), and various underground research facilities
setting.atmosphere: Tense, paranoid, intellectually rigorous. The world teeters between hope and fear as humanity confronts proof of alien intelligence.
setting.technology_level: Near-future realistic - quantum computing emerging, AI assistants common, climate crisis managed but not solved, private space industry mature

physics.communication: Light-speed limited - Voyager 2 signals take hours to reach Earth from outer solar system
physics.voyager_modifications: Probe's systems have been quantum-altered by alien technology - operating beyond original specifications but following observable physics

technology_constraints.ai_limitation: No true AGI exists - advanced narrow AI only
technology_constraints.space_capability: Humans have lunar base, Mars missions planned, but no interstellar capability
technology_constraints.communication_tech: Radio telescopes can detect Voyager's signals, quantum decryption exists but is experimental

social_structures.global_politics: Fragmented - UN weakened, regional blocs (NAU, EU, Asian Coalition, African Union) compete for influence
social_structures.science_authority: Private observatories compete with government agencies - scientific discovery is politicized
social_structures.public_awareness: Initially low, escalates rapidly - social media drives both unity movements and conspiracy theories
social_structures.power_dynamics: First contact is weaponized - whoever controls alien knowledge controls the future

alien_contact_rules.test_nature: Aliens are evaluating humanity's intelligence AND social cohesion through mathematical challenges embedded in signals
alien_contact_rules.no_direct_contact: Aliens never appear directly - only through Voyager 2 as intermediary
alien_contact_rules.choice_mechanism: Humanity must achieve consensus on response - divided civilizations are rejected
alien_contact_rules.timeline_pressure: 18-month countdown from discovery to Voyager's Earth arrival - creates urgency

themes: Unity vs Division - Can humanity overcome tribalism when faced with cosmic significance?
Knowledge as Power - Who has the right to control first contact?
The Loneliness of Intelligence - What if we're being tested and fail?
tone: Cerebral and tense. Emphasizes intellectual puzzle-solving and political maneuvering over action. Characters debate philosophy, ethics, science. Dialogue-heavy. Atmosphere of creeping paranoia mixed with wonder.
